title: World State Root does not match during Nimbus Backwards Sync

labels.name: TeamGroot
labels.description: GH issues worked on by Groot Team

labels.name: P2
labels.description: High (ex: Degrading performance issues, unexpected behavior of core features (DevP2P, syncing, etc))

labels.name: TeamChupa
labels.description: GH issues worked on by Chupacabara Team

body:
Split out from https://github.com/hyperledger/besu/issues/5411

Doesn't happen everytime, but easiest way to recreate is by simply restarting both clients together for an in-sync besu and nimbus pair.

Once the error is hit, it sometimes requires a restart to recover (in this case because it was cached in the bad block manager and re-requested).
